amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to provide for a balanced budget; increase spending for Federal highway and mass transit programs by $11.6 billion over five years; and offset this increase through a 0.4 percent across-the-board reduction in tax cuts and in all other spending categories in the budget resolution--except for mandatory entitlements.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute to increase spending for federal highway and mass transit programs by a total of $11.6 billion over five years compared to the budget resolution, and would offset this increase through a 0.4% across-the-board reduction in tax cuts and in all other spending categories in the budget resolution--except for mandatory entitlements which would not be cut.

action.text: Amendment (A005) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Shuster.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shuster amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 214 - 216 (Roll no. 147).
